prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with swirling patterns and a round body.
I want a cute amphibious creature that uses water attacks and has a playful demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a blue frog with spiral markings and strong arms.
Make a cartoonish character with a bubbly personality and aquatic abilities.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in wetlands and has a distinctive spiral on its belly.
Design a medium-sized creature that can easily swim and enjoys playing in ponds.
Show me a Pokemon that has a unique round shape and powerful swimming skills.
